Sponsor Prospectus
www.coderetreat.com

code retreat floyd

April 24-25, 2010

What is a Code Retreat?

A free weekend retreat for software developers that want to hone their craft together. It is an opportunity for coders to retreat from production and the pulls of business to increase production capacity and quality, resulting in improved personal and business value when they return.

Sponsoring a code retreat is an opportunity to support the skills of the developer community at a fundamental level.

Who Started Code Retreats?

Code Retreats were started in 2009 by Corey Haines and J.B. Rainsberger. Since then there have been a few dozen retreats around the world and the idea continues to grow.


Corey Haines will be presiding over Code Floyd Retreat, imparting his skill of the software craft.


Code Floyd Retreat is the first two day code immersion.

Environment

Unlike other code retreats, Ruby will be the main language of Code Retreat Floyd. Many experienced rubyists plan to attend as well as developers new to Ruby helping expand our community.


Attendees

We plan to host 50 people. 40 people have already registered from all over the world, i.e, Main, California, Colorado, Mexico, Sweden. Business owners, developers experienced and new will be represented.

Sponsorship Levels

Catering ($500): Support feeding attendees while we feed their heads by helping us provide coffee/chia/snacks all day; quality local, organic foods for breakfast and lunch. For the Saturday night social we will have local wood-fire pizza and beer from a local brewery.

You get:

  • Logo on website (thousands of unique vists)
  • Twitter Shout-out
  • Several mentions at the event
  • A warm fuzzy feeling

 

Community Supporter ($1,000): Help support the rent for the Sun Music Hall on Saturday, the retreat center for lodging Saturday night and more coding on Sunday.

  • Logo on website
  • Promotional Text on Website
  • Twitter Shout-out
  • Handout of Promotional Items/Swag
  • Logo prominent at Pizza/Beer Social
  • A warm fuzzy feeling

Full Tour Sponsor ($3,500): Ten Code Retreats in 2010
